definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

The Phantom of the Opera by Andrew Lloyd Webber

sentences.english: But people are always coming late to operas .
sentences.chinese: 不过人们总是很迟才来看歌剧。

sentences.english: There are so many great shows playing; Phantom of the Opera.
sentences.chinese: 那里好看的表演太多了，比如说《歌剧魅影》。

sentences.english: Jessica's musical talents range from singing opera to playing the electric guitar.
sentences.chinese: 杰西卡很有音乐天分，从唱歌剧到弹电吉他她都会。

sentences.english: An opera is a play set to music.
Dvorak also wrote a number of other symphonies and nine operas.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克还写过许多其他的交响曲和九部歌剧。

sentences.english: That opera tenor can no loger hit the high notes as he used to.
sentences.chinese: 那位歌剧男高音已不能像以前那样唱高音了。

sentences.english: Soprano Tan Jing and Lei Jia will perform the title role Mulan.
sentences.chinese: 这部歌剧将由女高音谭晶和雷佳扮演主角木兰。

sentences.english: Thus, the study of the duet in Carmen has a special significance.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究歌剧《卡门》的重唱将有其特殊的意义。

sentences.english: The opera was directed by the well-known Chinese director, Zhang Yimou.
sentences.chinese: 歌剧由中国著名导演张艺谋执导。

sentences.english: Section 2 analyzes the artistic characteristic of the opera "Regret for the Past" in detail ;
sentences.chinese: 第二部分详细分析了歌剧《伤逝》的艺术特征。

sentences.english: He worked with the BBC Philharmonic and the Royal Opera House in London.
sentences.chinese: 他在伦敦曾与BBC交响乐团和英国皇家歌剧院合作。

sentences.english: LL: Hey, Li Hua, I've got two primo tickets to the opera.
sentences.chinese: Larry有两张歌剧的票，邀请李华一起去。

sentences.english: Inside the theatre, they were giving a performance of Bizet's Carmen.
sentences.chinese: 剧院里他们正在演出比才的歌剧《卡门》。

sentences.english: Above, a light artwork illuminates the Sydney Opera House on May 27.
sentences.chinese: 这是5月27日艺术景观灯照耀下的悉尼歌剧院。

sentences.english: The novel has to be classified as Chinese opera, film and opera, opera.
sentences.chinese: 该小说曾多次改被编为中国戏曲，电影和歌剧。

sentences.english: The grand opera has really clicked with young people.
sentences.chinese: 这出大歌剧博得年轻人的好评。
